rows.label: bf11010100_0040
rows.name: the 107th Pope of the Holy See of Acedia, Radaria,

rows.label: bf11010100_0050
rows.name:
sent an expeditionary force to
the military superpower of Shiya.

rows.label: bf11010100_0060
rows.name:
In just one night, its capital,
Homeropa, was brought to ruin,

rows.label: bf11010100_0070
rows.name:
and sank deep into the Cloud Sea,
taking the Divine Beast with it.

rows.label: bf11010100_0080
rows.name:
The disappearance of Shiya
sent tremors across all of Alst...

rows.label: bf11010100_0090
rows.name:
Publicly, the deed was attributed to a joint force
between the Holy See of Acedia and

rows.label: bf11010100_0100
rows.name: though this was the story they spread.

rows.label: bf11010100_0110
rows.name: and the emerging power of Superbia.

rows.label: bf11010100_0120
rows.name: But behind it all was the work of a single Blade...

rows.label: bf11010100_0140
rows.name:
The Heaven's Holy Grail,
said to be a revelation from God.

rows.label: bf11010100_0150
rows.name:
How his existence would intertwine
with the fates of Laura and myself,

rows.label: bf11010100_0160
rows.name: we could not have possibly known.

rows.label: bf11010100_0170
rows.name: At the time, we had yet to learn...

rows.label: bf11010100_0010
rows.name: You all look like you want to die, huh?

rows.label: bf11010100_0020
rows.name: Then I'll lend you a hand.
